ygData.subject: RE: Glowing Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes.  All of the Glowing Stiens huv been altered to the Stien of Mogguk.  In ma oppinion Verrant did tha right thin makin tha Stien harder ta git.  It
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
>So.. Upon logging in yesterday.. to my dismay.. the Eruds tonic that I had
>gotten for the Stein quest.. has now changed to a No Drop Item. On sunday
>it
>was lore.. now its no drop.. sigh.... So I am out of the league on this one
>now.. and upon looking the Mogguk stein is now implimented.. so does this
>mean that the Glowing stein is out of the game ?
>
>Guess i will have to save up some PP to get mine or hope that lilinye wants
>to do the quest twice.. sigh..
>
>Nate Spiritsummoner
>Rodcet Nife

Yes. All of the Glowing Stiens huv been altered to the Stien of Mogguk. In
ma oppinion Verrant did tha right thin' makin' tha Stien harder ta git. It
was too easy ta mass produce.

Lincus
E'ci
